text: The 2017 North Carolina Tar Heels football team represented the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill in the 2017 NCAA Division I FBS football season. The team was led by sixth-year head coach Larry Fedora and played their home games at Kenan Memorial Stadium. The Tar Heels competed as a member of the Coastal Division in the Atlantic Coast Conference. They finished the season 3–9, 1–7 in ACC play to finish in last place in the Coastal Division. ==Schedule== 2017 North Carolina Tar Heels football schedule. FBSchedules.com.
